short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic Reversi is a HTML5 Board Game. Play this stylish version of the classic board game Reversi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Classic Reversi on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!
Multilanguage The game runs in English, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Portuguese and German. If the playerâ€™s browser runs in one of the languages supported, the game will be automatically translated. If not, it will run in English by default.

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Classic Reversi extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Classic Reversi icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Classic Reversi popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

You also can play more game from the top-left menu
